### Guix builds | File | commit e2f6866cca3e0c3c74f94f2df50ed3243158ea32
(master) | commit 1e80867eb5c56d2d7dd04568915c1ec759f40717
(master and this pull) | |--|--|--| | *-aarch64-linux-gnu-debug.tar.gz | [`b9317425f5ae0772...`](https://drahtbot.space/guix/bitcoin/bitcoin/e2f6866cca3e0c3c74f94f2df50ed3243158ea32/bitcoin-e2f6866cca3e-aarch64-linux
No idea if it's a problem, but won't this detect V=0 as well?

Right yes, I just wanted to conform with the `README` which says that we will do thing if `"$V"` is non-empty. Perhaps I can note in the `README` that we don't try to interpret the value of `"$V"` at all.
